name: Ninja Runner Free
description:
Run to escape the Evil Demon.

Test your reflexes as you race down ancient Japanese walls and along the winds.
Click to jump the platforms and watch out for the deadly spikes and wheels of hell.

FEATURES

HD, Vector Graphics!

Cool Sound Effects!

Climb through Leaderboard!

Jump through Hurdles!

Run More and Earn More!



Product of Gamebread
